headline: GILD Wins Approval for Twice-Yearly HIV Prevention Shot in the EU
summary: Gilead secures EU approval for twice-yearly HIV prevention shot Yeytuo, backed by strong trial data and expanded market protection.

raw.headline: GILD Wins Approval for Twice-Yearly HIV Prevention Shot in the EU
raw.summary: Gilead secures EU approval for twice-yearly HIV prevention shot Yeytuo, backed by strong trial data and expanded market protection.

headline: Gilead’s Yeytuo approved in EU, boosting its blockbuster potential
summary: Analysts and charities have identified Gilead’s new HIV prevention injection as key to curbing infection rates.

raw.headline: Gilead’s Yeytuo approved in EU, boosting its blockbuster potential
raw.summary: Analysts and charities have identified Gilead’s new HIV prevention injection as key to curbing infection rates.

headline: Gilead wins European approval for HIV prevention injection
summary: Investing.com -- Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ:GILD) said Tuesday it has received European Commission (EC) approval for its twice-yearly injection to prevent HIV, a key regulatory milestone following its U.S. clearance earlier this year.

raw.headline: Gilead wins European approval for HIV prevention injection
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ:GILD) said Tuesday it has received European Commission (EC) approval for its twice-yearly injection to prevent HIV, a key regulatory milestone following its U.S. clearance earlier this year.

headline: European Commission Authorizes Twice-Yearly Yeytuo® (Lenacapavir) for HIV Prevention
summary: FOSTER CITY, Calif., August 26, 2025--Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: GILD) today announced that the European Commission (EC) has granted marketing authorization for Yeytuo® (lenacapavir)—the company’s twice-yearly injectable HIV-1 capsid inhibitor—for use as pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) to reduce the risk of sexually acquired HIV-1 in adults and adolescents with increased HIV-1 acquisition risk who weigh at least 35kg. Yeytuo is the first and only twice-yearly PrEP option to be approved for u
